Kraken.name: 10000 Megaton Slam
Kraken.text: The Kraken slams down its tentacles in an endless barrage, shifting the landscape for aeons to come.

Tarrasque.name: Transdimensional Obliteration
Tarrasque.text: Your mind and body warp and twist as the Tarrasque tears you apart through every dimension.

Amygdalia.name: Cerebrum Diruo
Amygdalia.text: Steel yourself, this pain is minimal for what's to come.
